DirMaint modifications Example 15-13 shows a snippet from a CONFIGAA DATADVH file that was used to override DirMaint defaults, which makes the output lines longer to eliminate wrapping. This change overrides the 52 or 73 character line length. DirMaint displays output lines of 127 characters before wrapping them. For a 160-column screen, 127 characters works well.
